title: 100 boots to midnight
desc: Measuring the yee in my haw

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text:
I'm being observed 
 by a group of scientists
panels.hovertext: This is not a horse of honor, no highly esteemed steed rides here

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
panels.text:
Tonight they will meet 
 and decide whether to move 
 the hands of the cowboy clock
panels.hovertext: This is not a horse of honor, no highly esteemed steed rides here
